Class ConditionalBloc

java.lang.Object
  script.Bloc
      script.ConditionalBloc
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoBloc, IfBloc
public abstract class ConditionalBloc
extends Bloc

Conditional bloc is the base abstract class for if and do blocs.

frank
